title: Topic 004 Question 042
body: You are developing an ASP.NET Core app that includes feature flags which are managed by Azure App Configuration. You create an Azure App Configuration store named AppFeatureflagStore as shown in the exhibit:
You must be able to use the feature in the app by using the following markup:
You need to update the app to use the feature flag.
Which values should you use? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
